item.title: How To Use Journalctl to View and Manipulate Systemd Logs
item.description: 1 Basic Log Viewing 2 Journal Filtering by Time 2.1 Displaying Logs from the Current Boot 2.2 Filtering by Message Interest 本文为摘录，原文为： https://www.digitalocean.com/community/tutorials/how-to-use-journalctl-to-view-and-manipulate-systemd-logs 1 Basic Log Viewing 要查看 journald 守护程序收集的日志，请使用 journalctl 命令。 当单独使用时，系统中的每个
